name: Leah Ferguson
text: Came in last minute for a german chocolate cake. He wasn't able to make the cake due to the time frame (like I said, last minute) but he was able to make german chocolate cupcakes.  Thank you so very much!!!!

name: Pearl Leigh
text: Very delicious cupcakes and brownies.

name: Jason Rayner
text: This place is a great place to do business with.  When I asked for Mint Chocolate cupcake at last minute, the owner delivered.  He was awesome to make another suggestion when I asked him which cupcake of the day that I wanted to indulge for myself--Caramel 🍎.  Highly recommend!

name: lameccabaker
text:
Went on 5/9/2020 this was my fist time trying this company and the guy who was running the store was very friendly, nice and also knowledgeable I will be back oh did I mention they cupcake are fresh,big and delicious
Love: L.Mclester

name: Angel Elaine
text: BEST CUPCAKES AROUND! The man that was there the day I went to pick up cupcakes for my daughters birthday was super kind & helpful. Thank you so much!

name: April Puckett-Lloyd
text: I got 3 different flavors of cupcakes for a family picnic expecting them to taste as great at they look. When we finally got eating the cupcakes we quickly discovered that the buttercream was so sweet it hurt our teeth and the chocolate cupcakes tasted bitter and bland, while the vanilla cupcake was just bland. They were also incredibly dense and heavy for a cupcake. The cupcakery was really cute and the gentleman who was there was very nice. Another thing that I found disconcerting was that there is not menu or board with prices for the cupcakes or anything else in the place. None of the cupcakes had prices next to them either. I ended up paying $10 for 3 blah cupcakes... The price would not have bothered me as much if the cupcakes had tasted good.

name: So_ Blind
text: Met the owner and he was extremely courteous. Would highly recommend.

name: Lynn Malchus
text: Best cupcakes ever!

name: Cindy Cowan
text: Look Delicious

name: Nicole Shultz
text: Absolutely amazing experience!  They were able to take a couple photos I found on Pinterest and create the most amazing creation for my daughter’s 6 year old birthday!  Highly recommend them!

name: Judy Johnston
text: Family owned and operated. All goodies are homemade fresh. I love everything! Birthday cakes are fresh, moist and flavorful as well as beautiful! I am really partial to the giant chocolate chip & peanut butter cookies and scones.

name: Amanda Bishop
text: I visited here today for the first time in a long time. I used to stop by here after high school for a Cranberry and White Chocolate scone, and wow are they just as delicious as I remember! This place is worth a stop. Very kind staff, I’ve never had a bad experience

name: Mallory Meriwether
text:
NEVER AGAIN! I just walked in there to get my 4 year old daughter one of their Signature Milkshakes that you see in the photo above. When we walked in they said that they were too busy make one of these milkshakes for my daughter. There were zero customers in the store.

My daughter left the store crying. They did not seem to care in the slightest. Don’t advertise something that you are too “busy” to make.

resp.text: Sorry we were not able to accommodate you.  We lost a day due to the storms and we were short staffed.  We were still preparing cupcakes and filling our cases as was stated.  I can't prepare a Milkshake without everything that is needed to go on it. Sorry for the inconvenience

name: Lauren Braxton
text: Everything tastes amazing, down to their homemade whipped cream! The milkshakes are out of this world, and you can’t beat their awesome customer service! Love Tee’s!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of our business.  Your opinion means so much to us.  So glad you enjoyed your shake,  and our customer service.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: Steven Jemison
text: Just heard of this place a few weeks ago, this was the second trip here!!! They have so many choices I just want one of every thing , had the mini strawberry cake last time wow!!!!! Tried the mini key lime pie this time, and a peanut butter brownie,  chocolate chip cookie and a toffee crunch cookie. After reading the other reviews I have to say the staff here was very friendly the two times I went in.

name: Red Stepchild
text:
** HUBBY got out of Trouble w/ Tee's Cupcakes. **
My Hubby forgot what day it was. In a panic, he visited Tea's and they SAVE HIS HEINNEY with a fabulous Glamorous cupcake that was so AMAZING that I couldn't believe he found these. As I type this review, my co-worker (another husband panicking "What do I but my wife for her birthday".. he is looking at Tea's website and drooling. A great lil gem of a place. Thank you from David & Stephany Henson.

name: Chad Beasley
text: We stopped by and got a few treats and everything I tried was amazing! The heath bar cookie and cherry danish were SOOOO good! I didn’t try the gigantic cupcakes but they looked incredible! They also have ice cream and over the top milkshakes. We will be back!

name: Darryl Peterson
text: I love this place!  I do not go as often as I like because I cannot afford the weight gain it would cause.  Everyone that has helped me has been wonderful.  I think there is a "feel" here that you find when the people truly love what they do.  The selection may be smaller than other bakeries, but that is what I expect for a small, hometown bakery - quality over quantity.  Even then, I'm sure that if I requested anything in advance I could get it.

name: Art 2 Leo
text: Customer service💯...Oreo cake👌🏾...Peanut butter cake/cupcakes 🏁...and MUCH MORE. I was impressed upon arrival, witnessing one of the owners assist a customer to the car, with a beautifully decorated cake. GREAT PLACE.I’d give them 6 stars..

name: Joey Williams
text: Tried to order a Birthday cake for my daughter, was flat out told they could not get to it even with several days advance notice.  I have been faithful to this company since the first day they opened, but would not buy another thing from them, nor recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Hello Joey thank you for your review. You just called about 30 minutes ago, if I'm not mistaken,  and asked the owner for a cake tomorrow(not advanced notice). We were more than happy to get you a traditional cake,  but you were wanting a custom designed cake.  I am completely booked on any custom cakes.  I try my absolute hardest to squeeze in as many last minute orders as I possibly can,  but I have a limit and there are people who order weeks and months in advance and I must honor their orders first.  I do apologize that we were not able to accommodate your request.

name: Greg Mattes
text: Order a custom cake, yellow cake with fudge filling and chocolate buttercream for my wife’s b-day. She said it is one of the best cakes she has had. Cake was moist, fudge filling was awesome and the chocolate buttercream was not to sweet but had lots of flavor. Lots of other desserts and pastries to try here. She is waiting for the next occasion so we can order another cake. They were very good at getting this cake for me as it was on short notice a little over a day. Thank you!

name: Scott Wheeler
text: Great place with great food and great people. They stayed open almost an hour late just so my girlfriend and I could meet up from different parts of the state and eat there. Cheap and delicious, will definitely return

resp.text: Thank you very much for stopping by.  So glad you enjoyed your experience and sweets with us.  See  you soon.

name: Lexx Slays
text: This place is absolutely amazing!!!!! Clean,  friendly,  welcoming atmosphere.  The pastries and sweets are to die for!!!! Not only are the cakes and pastries beautifully decorated they also taste amazing.  The absolute BEST place in town!!! If you haven't been GO!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for reviewing Teescakes&pastries. So glad that you enjoyed your experience with us.  Looking forward to seeing you again

name: Marsha Carr
text: Customer Service as well as the desserts was amazing.

name: Karen Leonard
text: Anointed

name: gavin ragland
text: The owner has years of experience decorating, and she is a really good person.

name: Kala Patterson
text: Very rude & poor customer service !!!

resp.text: Hello Kayy. I'm sorry you feel you had a bad experience. You left a bad review because we were not able to produce a custom cake with an extremely short notice.  You called first did not have a guest count, cake design, nor a photo of what you wanted and expected a price.  You then sent a photo late Thursday evening via Facebook after  closing hours and needed the cake produced on saturday.  I simply told you no that I was booked. Please learn proper etiquette when inquiring services. We were not being rude , we were trying to get further information from you.  Be blessed.

name: Carla Hogan
text: Holy milkshake , Batman!!! Fantastic

name: Jack Ferrell
text: THIS PLACE WAS GROSS ! THE CUPCAKES ARE JUST FAT AND NOTHING BUT ICING THAT TASTES GROSS! The food gave my whole family a stomach ache ! Never eat dinner there!

resp.text: Thanks for your response.  We stand by our products 100% if there was an issue,we would have gladly refunded you for any goods you were not satisfied with or replaced them with something that you would have enjoyed.  We only sale baked goods and pastries at this time, not dinner items.

name: betty seltzer
text: The food is excellent!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of our business.  Your opinion means so much to us.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: April Poe
text: Best place for desserts

name: Natan Jackel
text: Sweet

name: Kanae Malbrough
text:
We used her service for our Wedding 2020 Feb. before she had her store front in Fairhope. She was very personable and very thorough. Gave us the Sample of flavor (there was a minimal cost but really low cost) on cupcake and we had fun tasting every one of them. We just wanted simple two tear cake (flower were out by us lol) and the cake was delicious!
Her store in downtown sells cookies and cupcakes now, they are all so good!

name: Serena kay
text: On Aug 1st i contacted them for a  cake on Sept 10th.  I got a reply that they are booked till November.  I will have to take my business elsewhere.  Just an FYI to anyone that wants to do business here.

name: J Ball
text: I traveled over 1200 miles to Spanish Fort to celebrate my mother's birthday. I researched this web site, which states I can order a "regular signature cake"...NOT a custom cake...with a min of 72 hours notice. I then traveled 30 minutes to see the cakes and give 5 days notice for a simple pecan cake for my mother. I was dismissed with a "sorry it's a holiday week". I reminded them their site states 72 hours, and we had 5 days. I was quickly informed "with availability." I double checked, and nowhere does it state "with availability."  Thanks for wasting our valuable time and providing poor customer service. Do not recommend. Dr. Ball

name: Matthew Joyner
text: Brittney did an excellent job with our wedding cake. We did a cake tasting, showed her a picture of a cake that we liked from pintrest, and she blew it out of the water! The cake turned out better than the picture we showed her. She set it up beautifully and helped us with everything we needed. Perfect for any wedding!

name: Lauren Tilton
text: They went out of their way! I arrived 5 mins before closing and they kindly offered to frost some cupcakes meant for the next day. Made my mom’s bday! So appreciative! The cupcakes were delicious!

name: Ray Reynolds
text: We visited @sugarhousefairhope today and met the owner Brittney. We’ve booked our wedding cake with her but just had to try the cupcakes & cookies. I had the BEST cupcake I’ve ever had in my life. Hands down. The Peanut Butter cupcake, topped Reese’s pieces, was outstanding! The peanut butter icing was so scrumptious. My fiancée had the wedding cake cupcake and loved it. Wow! Friends, these are #musthave #cupcakes.

name: Ava Abbott
text: I had a wonderful experience! The two girls who were distributing the cookie boxes I bought were just the sweetest. The cookies tasted so good and I want to know how she made the icing taste so good!

name: Alan Evenson
text: Tastes amazing! Definitely going back!

name: Amy Stewart
text: She is so sweet, easy to work with, always helpful and her cakes are heavenly!! I have never heard a negative comment about her cakes and cookies. Her decorating is amazing!! We have been using her for 8 years! We will never go anywhere else!! Love love love her!!

name: Jordan Moore
text: The staff at this place was amazing and helpful. The cake and cookies (Frozen) we’re top notch, and my daughter thoroughly enjoyed them. Excellent local business that has great service.

name: Ann Wooten
text: This is the only bakery you need to remember! Never will I go anywhere else for any of my cake needs! I love this place! Professional , warm, welcoming & above all is appreciative of your business  !! Wish I could give more than 5 stars

name: Jeslyn Raetz
text: I had a strawberry cupcake from here and it was delicious!!!! The icing tasted just right and the cake was moist and perfect!! I was very satisfied!!!

name: Kc Hugz
text: These cakes are Aaaamazing!!! Cake is perfect and icing is to die for!!! So good ! You won’t be disappointed!!!

name: William Somar
text: Out of business

name: Mary Baker
text: We are normally casual visitors to Gigi's cupcakes, but we wanted a special cupcake cake made with mini cupcake's for our daughter's baptism. Gigi's Dothan was very accommodating and said right up front they could do it and offered to take my order over the phone, but I wanted to give them a sample picture so I ordered in store. All they needed was 48 hours notice and they produced a beautiful and tasty cake made with mini cupcakes (we wanted the mini's since we had kids and diabetics in our group who would need smaller portions). I liked that I could order different types of flavors (the chocolate torte is awesome mini or regular sized!). It was a little pricey compared to what a big box store or supermarket could have done, but overall we were very pleased and will continue to visit them!

name: Barbara Moore
text: We picked this place because of the gluten free options for my daughter and she loved the two she tried.  I had the cheesecake that was chocolate and it was outstanding!  My husband had another chocolate kind of cupcake and enjoyed it, too.  Fresh and tasty, substantial cupcakes.

name: Adriene Cabos
text: I was so impressed with their service. A lot of selection and friendly staff.

name: Sherry Shackelford
text: Will not buy any more cupcakes from here because they no longer have the lavender flavor.

name: Victoria Woods
text: Cupcakes looked great but we were disappointed to find out that the pile of frosting was more of a generic buttercream. The actual cake was nothing to get excited about and was not worth the price. Publix cupcakes are probably a better deal.

name: Kimberly Mclendon
text: Staff did a wonderful job making my daughter's birthday cupcakes.

name: Cortney Paulding
text: The Best Cupcakes!! The cakes are delicious by themselves and the buttercream icing is addicting!

name: B. Smith
text: Friendly staff. Supports military, and the best cupcakes I have ever had.

name: Mr J
text:
Wasted my money ($100) & ruined a very special occasion.
Did not get what I asked for!

name: Brett Chivers
text: Great selection

name: Thomas Thompson
text: Oh wow another cupcake place

name: Tommy Huff
text: They have chocolate covered strawberries.

name: Jack Alexander
text: Best cupcake in the world

name: Beyblade Champion
text: Delicious

name: Seanet Couriers
text: Gigi,s dose a good job

name: Carrie Harville
text: We have LOVED everything we have ever gotten here!

name: Lisa Wilson
text: Simply Cakes is the best cakes . There cakes are moist and delicious. I always order the blueberry cake it's my favorite.

name: Roy Snipes
text:
Stopped in on a weekend trip from Georgia. We hit a gem. Bought a peanut butter cake and chocolate pie.
MY LORD...i was in heaven. Absolutely awesome.
Some sweet ladies that certainly knows how to bake.
I will be back. ..count on it

name: Lawanda Harris
text: The cakes were so nasty...and red velvet cake tasted awful.Caramel cake the icing looked as if it sshould have been chocolate icing,very dry too.Please be careful bc I spent $80.00 for nothing.Very displeased.NO, NO ,

name: KNIGHTHAMMER YT
text: The lunch was Amazing!!!!!!! Try the trio ... had chicken and  brocolli  crepes,  quiche,  and tomato  bisque  soup( my favorite). The ladies  that run the place were  so sweet . Will return  soon!

name: Charlene Lamb
text: Food choices are very good.  Cost is pricey.  Overall enjoyed my visit.  The food is delicious.  Will visit this place again

name: Ben Leyton
text: Their lunches are excellent. Love the Chicken Devane crepe. Cakes are out of this world.

name: Susan Frichter
text: Everything I have tried has been wonderful!  Great for every day or special occasions!  Try them you want be disappointed!!!

name: Diane Thomley
text: Great food!!

resp.text: Thank you we appreciate your business

name: Deborah James
text: Great, delicious homemade cakes.

name: Daniel Mathis
text: Good place

name: Alice Barfield
text: The chocolate layer cake is devine

name: Brittany Hathcote
text: I ALWAYS enjoy JoZettie's!!! I will go out of my way to either of her locations!! ALL of her stuff is good, but my favorite is the Pecan Pie Cupcake. It.Will. Rock. Your. World!! The owner is one of the sweetest people (pun-intended) that you will ever meet and knows what she's doing!!

name: Beth Beam
text: Everything is so yummy and the staff is always so nice!

name: Afra Williams
text: Like the other JoZettie's these cupcakes are AMAZING. This location has less cupcakes as the day goes on but I suspect it's because they may get them from the original location.. either way its worth the trip.

name: A. M. D. Vaughan
text: The Sweet Potato Pie Cupcake.... Swoon worthy! 😌

name: Brenda Cook
text: The best keylime cake ever

name: Precious Hamilton
text: I really don’t know if it’s because business is slower, but I ordered four cupcakes on Saturday and all were dry and crumbly except the red velvet cupcake. I was so disappointed. I love their cupcakes, but this particular day it was a no for me!

name: Jackie Johnson
text: Best cupcakes I have ever had!!

name: Misty Genelle
text: Great homemade flavor! Love the variety of options. Keep doing what you’re doing!

name: Jeffrey Lamar
text: Jozettie's are amazing,  I wish they had a location in Atlanta!

name: Patricia Davis
text: I live in Florida and each time I visit Montgomery following church business we make it our business to stop by for the cupcakes which truly are divine!

name: Emma Hager
text: I've come here to provide dessert for work functions. It's a little on the expensive end for large orders, but totally worth it. The cupcakes are so moist and decadent and artfully frosted and come in a wide variety of flavors. My personal favorite flavor is silver wedding and my husband adores key lime. The staff are very friendly and welcoming and helpful in providing what you're looking for. I plan on returning in the future as long as the doors are open.

name: Annette Owens
text: all the cupcakes are fantastic.  the only one I would not ever try again is the peanut butter cupcake.  it tasted like it had cinnamon in the mix.

name: James Beam
text: Great cupcakes, best in Montgomery by far!

name: Mae Shinigami
text: Great value & selection. Excellent customer service. Red velvet cheesecake & vanilla cheesecake are to die for! The only downside is they don't have a military discount or a loyalty program... You can't always buy a dozen at a time, after all.

name: TaLandria Nation
text: Always a great experience. The staff is helpful and from the cupcakes to the cakes, you want to buy and/or try it all.

name: Valtoria Jackson
text: Homemade treats!!

name: Wing C
text: Awesome cupcakes, especially love the velvet cheese cake and sweet potato cake

name: Anna Williams
text: DELICIOUS CUPCAKES and so much variety.

name: Vanessa Estrada
text: Best cupcakes in AL! Red velvet cheesecake cupcake is the best! Definitely recommend people to try them!

name: Sherry T
text: Delicious cupcakes

name: Transformational Butterfly
text: Best red velvet in town! Employees attitudes needs work.

name: Aviance Turnbull
text: The cupcakes are great. We usually go in to the location to grab a couple. But their location doesn't do well with preorders. We tried it once and by ordering a month in advance and still had to wait for the order to be assembled once we arrived...it wasn't a great experience. We will stick to Publix for large group orders.

name: Jerryd Curry
text: Best cupcakes you'll ever have! The red velvet🔥🔥

name: Renee Nettles
text: Hands down the best sweet treats in Alabama...I love me some JoZettie's..keep doing what you do!

name: Harold Bell
text: This is the best bakery in the city of Montgomery!!!! You can taste the love in all of their bake goods.

name: KC Crusoe
text: Although, service was great. I was disappointed with the lack of Cupcake flavors.

name: Robert McGhee
text: The best cupcakes in Montgomery!!!

name: Krystal Boman
text: Going by the website they closed at 5. Got there at 4:10 and they were closed. I'm so heart broken, I was leaving Biloxi,Ms and had my mouth set on cupcakes. Please update the info.....

name: Suzanne Maddox
text: Best cupcakes ever!! Hands down.

name: Theopolis Williams
text: The sweet potato pie cupcake is AWESOME

name: Mike Bamman
text: Best in the city hands down.

name: Blake Higdon
text: Wonderful -- really top notch.

name: Jessica Lawery
text: Best cupcakes ever!!!!

name: Kendrick Kidd
text: Delicious

name: gods chosen
text: Delicious

name: Lashonda Richardson
text: The Best!!!

name: David York
text: Delish...

name: Vanessa Chambers
text: Oh so Good with much love

name: Claire Austin
text: Highly recommend

name: Corinna Hillyer
text: Great cupcakes!!

name: Jacqueline “Lady J” Smith
text: Good cupcakes

name: Jamie Carter
text: Great!!! on any day.

name: Trebor J. Dukes
text: Awesomeness

name: Mona Graham
text: Love This Place

name: Monique Wise
text: Best cake and cupcakes ever..!!!!

name: James Ferguson
text: Great cupcakes

name: Jay Clyce
text:
Where do I start?  This small business is a delight.  I believe this is such a fun place because all of the different types of cupcakes.  They have something for EVERY occasion.  They are so yummy and fun at the same time.

Do you need to treat a friend, family member, colleague or client?  If they like something sweet, this is the place.

Don’t wait.  Reward yourself or someone you want to provide a smile to.  Go NOW!!!

name: Grant Langbauer
text: When driving 14+ hours, one must stop for a Gigis Cupcake(s)

name: shandrita foster
text: Delicious as always!

name: Christy Holden
text: So many great options to choose from! I love the mini cupcakes because they provide just the right amount of sweetness. Conveniently located and can be packaged up safely to take home if you want to share with friends!

name: Rikesha Foster
text: Pretty good cupcakes. Are they anything to write mom about? Not necessarily. They are pretty on the outside, but as far as taste-wise, they are average cupcakes. Nothing more, nothing less. But give them a try.

name: MO Mules
text: Not the freshest, they were dry and overcooked..frosting was great. Maybe an off day for baking? Not sure but cake was tossed. Nice little shop and worker.

name: Sandra Accardi
text: The perfect sweet treat for a quick gift or just indulging your sweet tooth. The 2-size option is very helpful when my different moods require different levels of sweetness. Great variety of flavors!

name: David Carter
text: As a Pharmaceutical Representative, we are always looking to separate ourselves from our competitor. So, I am very reluctant to reveal this hidden jewel. The cakes and cupcakes are excellent! My customers always look forward to treats from Gigi's! As a rep they are very easy to work with and the customer service is second to none!

name: Bill Tiemann
text: This is a great place to pick up a gourmet cupcake. The cake is light and fluffy and the buttercream frosting is over the top. Highly recommended.

name: J Hanson
text: We have only had good experiences with Gigi's!  We have placed several large orders as gifts and Gigi's is always so helpful.  Their customer service is beyond excellent and they make it all so easy for us.  We will definitely continue ordering from Gigi's!

name: Eric S
text: I agree with those posting overrated.  I don't know why we keep buying from this place.  Loaded with tons of sugar on the top and the actual cake part is never really as good as you could make at home.  I could make 12 for the price of one.  Got 3 s'mores tonight and the cake was a bit stale and not very good.  In addition the receipt has a line to leave a tip.  Are you kidding me?  At nearly $4 per cupcake, they need to pay their staff more and not ask me for tip for someone reaching into a cabinet and putting a cupcake in a box.  It's a bit over the top.  I don't plan to buy any more cupcakes from there.

name: Racheal Day
text: I waited years to try GiGi's. I wasn't mind blown. They we're good but nothing special and I had to cut the icing in half.

name: Sweetpee Learning from ground Zero using my press
text: Everything was great treats and service...I hate the state the company is in...bc they have great cupcakes 😋

name: Ju Mc
text: Great cupcakes but will be permanently closing on 31MAR19.

name: James R. Landrum
text: Pleasant staff. The cupcakes didn't really suit my tastes, but I'm not huge on icing. The stuffed cookies are actually very good, though.

name: Manley Whittier
text: After eating Gigi's cupcakes many times and loving them, I was very disappointed this past Friday night. I went in your establishment after dinner and saw the Salted Caramel Chocolate cupcakes and had to try them as I love just about anything salted caramel. I also got a Sundae cupcake too. After getting home, my wife and I tried to eat the cupcakes and they tasted old and somewhat burnt. Do you bake your cupcakes fresh daily or do you keep them for sale until they are gone? We ended up throwing out what we didn't eat. I hope your quality is not going down but if I go there again and have a similar experience I will not return.

name: Bree Sison
text: I love this place probably a little too much.  Always delicious & super appreciate their military discount!

name: David McDonald
text: GiGi's Hoover catered my wedding. They were affordable, professional and most of all delicious!! We had bourbon maple cupcakes and champagne cupcakes along with a white cake with butter cream frosting for us to cut. The managers/owners Jason and Cheryl Vinyard were awesome to work with and I would easily recommend them for any occasion big or small.

name: Celeste Cohill
text: I ordered one of the lemon. The icing was delicious but the cake just didn't deliver at all.

name: Hope Heath Cox
text: GiGi's cupcakes catered my wedding cake, grooms cake, and mini cupcakes for my wedding and I am still in awe of the wonderful job that they did. I would encourage all brides in the Birmingham area to go for a tasting and you will not be disappointed. I had about 5 tastings with the most popular wedding cake bakers in the area and while they were all good, the cake at GiGi's out-tasted everyone! Not many people realize that they also offer full-size wedding cakes and not just cupcakes. I had a brunch wedding and went to taste the cinnamon roll cake that I had heard was fantastic (was actually recommended by my caterer, Kathy G). Wow, it was phenomenal!! The Chocolate grooms cake was just as tasty. I had a tight window that in which I needed the cake delivered and set up since I was having my ceremony and reception at the same place. They went out of there way to get it there in time and set up... it was absolutely perfect. Honestly the best tasting cakes I have ever had at a wedding and my guests agreed. They were also beautifully decorated! Bravo, GiGi's!

resp.text:
Hope,

Thank you so much for your wonderful comments.  It was our pleasure to share a part of your special day.

name: j milwood
text: Always a good experience and great variety offered. Kudos to the employees for always being friendly.

name: Toni Williams
text: My daughter wanted to try a Gigi's cupcake so bad, so what a perfect time to surprise her with one since she had been sick.  The the store itself is decorated beautifully, but the customer service did not match.  Since this was my first time in the store I had a lot of questions and the young lady that was assisting me really acted like, 'would you just buy a cupcake please."  I did not know what to buy so I bought 5 different kinds.  And they are wayyyyyyy to sweet, they are loaded with frosting but I thought they would have cut back on the sugar, but that was not the case. The cake stuck to the cupcake wrapper and , the boxes they put them in are beautiful but don't close all the way so the air made them hard 3 hours after I bought them.  I was really disappointed.  Not to mention the 5 I bought were almost 16.$ I would have saved money and enjoyed cupcakes from Publix better.

name: Ally D.
text: The cupcakes were really tasty. I always thought it was a little bit pricy but it was worth it. I really hope I didn't eat the one with the fly landed on..

name: Crystal Brophy
text:
SO OVERRATED!
Not a really good cupcake honestly.
Publix bakery cupcakes are 10x better!
Over rated, over priced & over iced!
I do not know why people insist on saying, "You must have a GiGi's cupcake, they are the best"! Because in my book and many people that I know agree, that they are FAR from the best.
The cake part is moist, but not that flavorful and they overdo the frosting bigtime. I could frost 3 cupcakes with the amount they put on 1 cupcake.
Not good at all.
Sorry GiGi's, you are not a top notch bakery.
SOURCE: Bought a strawberry cupcake from GiGi's a few years back and wasn't thrilled at all, specially for the price. Since then, I have had about 4 more (ones that people have had at parties and such) and I just ate a chocolate one like 10 minutes ago, every single one was the same, not good.

name: Hannah maddox
text: I loved going to GiGis kiosk in the mall because I loved the little blonde girl who worked there! So sweet and always have great conversation! I was so sad to hear that she was fired for "customer  dissatisfaction." Very very confused GiGis!!! :(

name: Connie Settles
text: We ordered the turtle cheesecake....overloaded on sugar and not very tasty. We did not enjoy these!

name: Micahel Shavers
text: Good cupcakes, prices are a bit high, but of good quality and taste.

name: Amanda Miniard
text: Came for my free birthday cupcake and they put a candle in it for me!  What a great way to make someone feel special!

name: Rosanna Dale
text: Great customer service and good Cupcakes!

name: Valerie H
text: Better than one in Trussville.  Still too expensive.

name: Janet McDonald
text: Employee was rude when I asked about coupon I had from clipper magazine. You would have thought that I had asked for a free item! I won’t be doing business here until staff has a bit of training in customer service!

resp.text: Hi Janet, all I can say is WOW!! I am so sorry this happened to you.  We have those coupons published for our guests to use.  This is totally unacceptable behavior and it won't be tolerated.  Please give us a call so we can get some information from you about your experience.  205-444-4170. Please ask for Cheryl.

name: Sheila Brown
text: Cupcakes are delicious!

name: Ashleigh
text: Great!

name: Brenna Marshall
text: Best gluten-free cupcakes ever!

name: Tricia Colley
text: The Flour Sack made our wedding cakes this weekend and they were divine!!! The bride's cake was strawberry, and the groom's was chocolate with chocolate covered strawberries on it.... they were both so, so delicious! Thank you so much to the Flour Sack for helping make our day a little sweeter!

name: Kendra Pope
text: When my niece passed away a wonderful family purchased some cupcakes, cookies and mini pound cakes. Everything was delicious!

name: ja son
text: My daughters Fox birthday cake was so adorable !! It was also delicious and moist. Would order from them again, and again. Thank you so much The flour sack bakery

name: Juan Cepero
text: Ive been twice now and I’ve had the cupcakes, cookie sandwiches, edible cookie dough and cheesecake. It is all so delicious, probably not good for me but I don’t care because it makes me happy lol The lady at the desk is always nice and friendly. I definitely would not hesitate in getting some sweet treats from them. This place is a must visit for sure, and I can’t wait to go back for some more. A++

name: madison kimbro
text: I just ordered a birthday cake for my boyfriend’s birthday and I can honestly say that it was the best cake I have had in a while. It looked great and tasted amazing. Highly recommend this place!!!

name: Bill Crawford
text:
My wife heard about The Flour Sack from her PT(knee surgery last week). Me trying to be a good husband, she told me that she would like to try so I immediately told her let's do it. We called to make our order and were both very happy with the customer service and ease of the process and selection on short notice. We were on the circle across town so we made it there in just a few minutes. I went inside and was greeted in the most cozy, comfy place I had ever been in Dothan by a very sweet, kind lady(wish I had gotten her name so I could thank her on here but too late now, thank you for you're awesome service). Our order was already prepared that quickly but the case had items my wife didn't mention so risking getting in trouble (lol not really but husband's will understand) I asked if I could add a few items and without hesitation she was ready to help me. She packaged it up, gave me a total, I paid, and left it was a wonderful all around experience. This was the simplest part of this review lol. Skip forward a few hours, we are home and have had dinner and my wife is ready to try out the cupcakes. We both had a red velvet cupcake first and we had to stop what we were doing and thinking about to take in the experience that was happening. I can not explain in words how perfect they were, texture, smell and the taste... OMG, hands down the best red velvet anything that I've ever had my entire life (I'm 33), we then had to try another one so we each tried a different one so we could taste more without eating too much and still try more because we are still both in shock of the amazing thing happening. I got a key lime cupcake and she got a birthday cake cupcake, again we both were blown away by how incredible this all was. She is actually rushing me now because I had to stop then and write this review to let anyone know, who has a sweet tooth or any reason to get a treat, this is the place to go. We will go back in future and tell everyone we know to go try it because it is that great of an all around experience start to finish. Thank you so much and we look forward to the next time.

Update to the review, this is the next day and my wife has started negotiating terms of the last cupcake because they are that amazing.

name: Nicole Mitchell
text: Had the cupcakes.  melt in your mouth.

name: •Olivia•
text: The two ladies that were working are the sweetest, most polite people I’ve seen all day. Service was excellent, cupcakes were delicious and packaged carefully (none got messed up on the ride home), and I will absolutely visit again.

name: Jason York
text: I’m not big on sweets, but I could eat my weight in these cupcakes! The red velvet and strawberry are, hands down, the best cakes I have ever had! The owners are always extremely nice and seem to be genuinely great people.

name: Kelsey Gardiner
text: The cupcakes were good. My only recommendation is for the staff to better their email communication with customers. However, I’d purchase again!

name: janice mcglaun
text: I love their cupcakes.  They are always so fresh and tasty.  It is a family owned business that puts a lot of effort into giving you great service.

name: Becky Dines
text: Great communication and amazing cake and cake pops! Thank you for making my daughter's birthday such a tasty experience!

name: DeeSha Connor
text: I ordered half a dozen assorted cupcakes for my mother's birthday to be delivered. Schenita did a great job taking my order over the phone. I live  out of state and she made this process seamless. My mother received her order on her birthday and said her cupcakes were delicious. I will definitely order from this bakery again.

name: Henry Tellis
text: Great Service and ownership.

name: Dianne Hotter
text: We were looking for a bakery just for a treat while we visited the Hank Williams museum and this bakery was near so we decided to stop. What a lucky day for us today visit this cupcake place! Previous reviews said it was the best cupcakes. I wondered how it could be any different than any others I’ve had. Well they are!!! These are the best cupcakes I’ve ever eaten! The cake itself is so good and the frosting is just perfect! We are from Michigan but next time we pass through Montgomery we will definitely stop. The bonus is the people are SO friendly that work there and I’m sure own it.

name: Felicia O.
text: I was hoping for an authentic Red Velvet cake. Taste nothing like RedVelvet. I’m so disappointed. I was hoping I’d found someone that could make it based on the reviews. Ruined my birthday.  The owner is very kind, though. And, the cake is beautiful.  I guess my search continues.

name: krissie womble
text: Always so helpful and the cupcakes are the best!

name: Lin Lee
text: Cupcakes are homemade and delicious. They also TASTE homemade. Not ridiculously sweet, they are perfectly balanced. Great Bakery.

name: Thaddeus Thompson
text: I got the German chocolate cupcakes and the only bad part was you can't put chocolate icing on a German chocolate cupcake it has to only be the coconut icing.

name: pinkcufflynx
text:
I absolutely love their cupcakes! So when we needed a cake for my fiance's son 10th birthday we called them.  We sent them a picture that their mom found on pinterest. The  owners kept all emails clear and frequent through the whole process. They responded promptly to the first email and when we went to pick it up, it exceeded our expectations. They put so much thought into it and it turned out better than the pinterest version! Everyone at the party said the cake was delicious and well designed!

P.S. they also provide the acrylic stand winched helped us achieve the whole look!

name: Geo Key
text: Thank you Little Red Cupcake for making the cake and the cupcakes.   The sheet cake was  beautiful, the cupcakes were gone in no time.   I thought your red velvet was my favorite, then I tried Key Lime.  If anyone needs a cake or cupcakes go see Nita.  They will be my go to for events from now on.

name: Varallina Gazubinett
text:
Honestly the best, most personable folks running LRC. It was such a breeze to make a same-day delivery order over the phone and they really went out of their way to do a complicated delivery. 12/10 service. From now on, they will always be my go-to bakery in Montgomery.
PS. They deliver to Maxwell AFB!!

name: Holly Barclay
text: I had to order a cake for my husband's promotion via long distance.  Nita and Fred were super great to work with.  The cake looked Great! I told them that I wanted some thing which looked Great as well as tasted amazing!  It was a beautiful cake and I had a lot of inquiries into who did the cake.  Two or three people even said it was the best cake they had ever tasted in Montgomery.  I will order additional cakes from LRC!

name: J. A. McGlaun
text: I love the cupcakes that they make.  Always so fresh.

name: NIGHT DRIVER
text: We purchased a cake on 12/22 and it was good and moist. Here it is 8 days later and the cake taste the same as it did when we purchased it. I will continue to be a Little Red Cupcake customer. The staff is very nice and professional.

name: Gloria Sellers
text: I got the red velvet and German Chocolate cupcakes. Trying to pace myself. Absolutely divine. Moist and flavorful. Wish I had bought more.

name: Tommy Nichols
text:
We used Little Red Cupcake to deliver to some of our customers at Christmas time.  We actually had our customers calling us for their
phone number. Absolutely great response. Highly recommend and
you will be satisfied. Great people to deal with.

name: SHUNDA FRAZIER
text: Always fresh and delicious

name: Mae Shinigami
text: Awesome cupcakes, great loyalty program (buy 5 get 1 free) & amazing customer service. The one drawback is their red velvet cheesecake cupcakes had barely any cheesecake... :(

name: Shayna Smith
text: This is a true gem! I walked in and was greeted with smiles and the sweet aroma of different flavors 🤤 Everyone gave exceptional customer service👍🏾 AND the red velvet cupcakes are AMAZING 😍😍😍

name: Emma Holleman
text: I've ordered twice from here now through waitr. The first time I bought some I was just like "meh I want something sweet this will do." I wasnt expecting some of the best cupcakes I'd ever tasted. Ya'll are awesome!!!

name: Ethel Rollins
text: Wonderful place, excellent service. Even better cakes and cupcakes.

name: TheJkperry1
text: Little Red Cupcake is our go to place for cupcakes when we are celebrating someone's birthday at work. Their cupcakes are delicious!! We have been pleased each and every time we have ordered from them.

name: Stacey Lancaster
text: The best birthday cakes ever.  Any cake ever. They always deliver!! I've been using them for over three years and I've never been disappointed.

name: Nikkia Wright
text: Best cake shop ever. They did my wedding cake , it was half Batman half traditional...I love this place...

name: Tiffanie B
text: Amazing cupcakes and my babies loved the cake pops!! This is my go to spot best cupcakes I've had!!

name: Sarah Mills
text: Delicious cakes and cupcakes! They are so friendly and accommodating, you think you've been lifelong friends!

name: DiDi Henry
text: Tried their cupcakes in their downtown Prattville location. They were excellent!

name: tam smith
text: We called LRCs to make minis for my mother's 65th birthday bash.  Everyone was soo accommodating and friendly.  The love they have for their products showed with every detail.  From ordering to picking them up, Fred made the process a breeze.  I can't thank you guys enough.  Need an awesome cupcake and awesome customer service?...This is the place!

name: Joshua Stroud
text: I try them for first time today and I drove down  here from Auburn.by far the best cupcakes I have ever had and by far the best customer service I have ever had

name: Barrett Vaughan
text: Very delicious cupcakes! Excellent service!

name: Henry Tellis
text: Great Service and ownership.

name: A. M. D. Vaughan
text: Little Red Cupcakery is THE BEST... You can taste the love that's poured into their confections in every single BITE!!! xxxooo

name: Charmaine Bradley
text: Always enjoyed doing business with them. They are one of the citys best!

name: Velvia Jones
text: Friendly service great cupcakes.

name: Brandi Rollins
text: The best!!! You should try the cupcakes and order a cake as well.

name: Tammy Cox
text: Love it!!!!can't go wrong with them any kind is good

name: Gregg Perry
text: Love this place and these folks!

name: Todd Vaughn
text: Great service!

name: Christopher Harris
text: Outstanding...

name: Sharonda Sankey
text: Awesome cakes and cupcakes!!

name: Renee Talley Segrest
text:
(Translated by Google) OMGoodness ... OMGoodness ♡♡♡ ☆☆☆

(Original)
Omgoodness...omgoodness♡♡♡☆☆☆

name: Savannah Jones
text: I'm very picky about breakfast burritos, and most places get them too greasy and falling apart. But the burrito I had here they toast it like a panini so it doesn't fall apart and it was the best tasting burrito! Sausage, cheese, egg, onions, peppers. I asked for extra cheese and a cup of salsa. Best breakfast I've had in awhile. And it was more than enough, I was worried about not having a side but I couldn't even finish my burrito.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed it! Come see us again soon!

name: Christine Wise
text: Great food, staff and atmosphere. We just discovered this place and have already visited it twice this week. Cheddar biscuits, chicken salad, fried pies all really yummy food. Can't wait to go back and try more stuff on the menu.

name: Kim Story
text: On a whim, I stopped here today to eat lunch. I got the strawberry and pecan salad (which came with an awesome dressing btw) ,and a fried apple pie. It was delicious!!! Will definitely be going back!

name: Jillian Wright
text: Hands down the best place in Arab- or even nearby- to get fried mushrooms. They are the only place that makes them just right!

name: Pam B
text: Delicious food! Very friendly staff with great service!

name: Ann Wright
text: Food was great. Staff friendly and attentive. Perfect spot for breakfast or lunch.

name: susan WING
text: I was so excited to finally be able to stop at the Station Cafe but now I  wish I had never made that stop. I ordered a large hot latte but what I got I have no idea. It was the worst latte I'd ever had. At first I thought it was just weak coffee and the guy just forgot what I ordered but I'm  not sure if it was even that. It was frothy so he got the milk part right I just don't know about the rest of it.  I did think at the time he made it awfully quick and I commented on that to him after all a 2 shot espresso latte takes a few minutes to make. I guess he must of just left out my 2 shots. Waste of $4.  I would have return to cafe but I  was almost home before I tried the drnk and I don't live in Arab.

resp.text: I’m so sorry that you didn’t enjoy your coffee! The gentleman that made your coffee today has many years of experience as a barista and since our opening in May, we’ve  had nothing but positive feedback on anything he’s made. Next time you are in town, we’ll be happy to refund your coffee or make you another one on the house! Again, I’m terribly sorry you didn’t enjoy your experience and we’d love the opportunity to try again!

name: Ivan Croes
text: Great options! Food is delicious!

name: Ducky
text: Absolutely loved it! The food was great and so was the coffee! Wish there had been a little more atmosphere. Some music or something playing would be great!

name: Jeremy K
text:
Excellent breakfast and a reasonable price.
Best sweet treats around. And its locally owned.   Well done Guy's.

name: Stephen Bearden
text: Fantastic coffee! Burgers were delicious!!

name: Malcolm Parsons (KI4KI)
text: Good food, good service, great atmosphere.

name: BulldogReddog
text: BEST COFFEE, I’ve drunk lots of coffee around the place but this is the easily the best for the best price 10/10 the worst part is finishing my coffee

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Michael Cobb
text: Excellent food. The service was impeccable. Prices are very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We value your business.

name: Ken Priest
text: Just went in to check it out

name: Pocket Bear
text: Food needs help

name: Andra Rutherford
text: Delicious food, great atmosphere, and excellent service!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving your review for our business.

name: Isaac Yaronczyk
text: The year before I had my birthday cake made and I ended up with one of the best red velvet cakes I have ever had. Recently I had a red velvet cake made to look like a pizza for my grooms cake, and yet again I was presented with an amazing cake for my special day. I have received nothing but amazing food, conversation, and customer service!

name: Elizabeth Logsdon
text: Cannot reccommend for pop in visit.  They ran out of cupcakes.  Unapologetic.  Said they could only take orders.  Disappointing experience.  They also said there was no where else to buy baked goods in the area.  LIES.  There’s a place called Sweet Treats up the road.  Lovely bakery.  Go there.

name: Scully
text: Great when she started out but now the store is frequently closed. Doesn't answer the phone. Misspelled the cake I ordered.

name: Zephanyah Barnes
text: Me and a couple guys hung here after the WestGate Pep-rally for EHS and its awsome!

name: Marah Momani
text:
So disappointed after paying 180$ on a 20 person cake I asked for Strawberries cream cheese I got it without any strawberries and it was so sweet and dry. The frosting was so thick.
The design was okay I was expecting more.
And they don’t put the cake in a clean box it was in a carton

name: Lorikeet pocket
text: We made frequent stops here, staff were always friendly, coffee phenomenal and the cupcakes and cookies were delicious. Always had a fun variety of products in their shop area that both my kids loved.

name: Steve-O-tronius37
text: This place is amazing! They have a lot of geek things and it's a great place to hang out with friends. I HIGHLY recommend you check it out!

name: Caroline Elizabeth
text: The atmosphere and the decorations on the cupcakes are great. Creativity is great too. But unfortunately their cupcakes are not so great tasting. The icing itself... it was a weird texture. I prefer a buttercream (if that's what they are claiming it is... it's the strangest buttercream) but even for a whipped it's not good. It just tastes like lard. And that's every single time Ives tried their cupcakes. My husband got two cupcakes from there recently and they tasted like a refrigerator. It's over priced and not good. I wish I could say differently because they have an awesome idea and the owner is super nice.

name: Kevin Deharo
text: Amazing game themed coffee/espresso drinks and cupcakes! You can walk in and play video games on the iron throne!

name: Bretta Elmore
text: She made a Zelda cake for my daughter’s 16th birthday....it was amazing!!!! Root beer flavored and perfectly decorated!!

name: Lori Fry
text: Great food and coffee. Friendly staff. Awesome items for sale.

name: judy sexton
text: Cute cupcakes but cake was dry, not fresh. Disappointing for nearly $4 each!!

name: Joseph Marrero
text: I was new to the area and this was the first place I stopped at , March 3 2017 we got the darth Vader iced and it was increadably good . The owner came out and talked with us for about 20 minutes and it felt like we were old friends from childhood , the place has great seating and the owner cares about her establishment, and it shows in the products as well as the upkeep.we left with a feeling of warmth and a welcome back anytime was extended. Great place to visit often . The whole family had a great time.

name: ccroissant catt
text: Very nice service!! The owner is nice and showed us a bunch of the cakes she’s done. They are all VERY impressive! Plus, all the merch was awesome! Very cute Pokémon, awesome DBZ cosplay, a bunch of Studio Ghibli plushies, and more! Definitely coming here again, especially when they move to the new building.

name: Tracy Helms
text: Misty is awesome!  Store is always clean, food is awesome and atmosphere is excellent!!!

name: Ryan Rodgers
text: Lol it's Kool I'm looking for a ride

name: Angelo Rocha
text: Love the decor and have great variety of sweets and drinks

name: EP Walker
text: Tried 6 different cupcakes,  all were supremely dry.

name: Chad Leuci
text: Amazing place with a professional cake maker

name: Laurel Faircloth
text: Great cupcakes,  fun atmosphere and friendly staff

name: james clay
text: Tried to pop in twice and never seems to be open.

name: Jonathon Broadhead
text: Good cupcakes and cool atmosphere.

name: Michael Allums
text: Best cupcakes and cakes around

name: LOUIS GAUTHIER
text: Nice place, good people

name: Preston Mcalhany
text: Best cupcakes in the world

name: Tammy Summers
text: Great cupcakes!

name: Jeremy (Jackal City)
text: Rarely open

name: Neymeic Lowe
text: Nice

name: Michael Allums
text: Best cupcakes and cakes around

name: Christopher Thomas
text: The only reason for 1 star is because you need to give a star to review. Quite simply the cupcakes may be very good but they never arrived. Around 7:15 the order was placed via door dash and it was estimated our delivery would arrive at 8:12.  At 900 we got a delivery confirmation but nothing was delivered. We then called on that and we were told they were on the way. It is now 1016, my card has been charged and no delivery. This problem may be a DD problem, but if a business  allows a second party to deliver for you it becomes the business owners problem as well for allowing an organization with unreliable help o represent your brand.y…. After posting they showed up at 1025

resp.text: We apologize you received your order late. We are a small operation and process many orders daily also we make our treats fresh for each customer for quality assurance & this sometimes requires a wait. We always attempt to call and/or text to update customers regarding any order delays. We can not control the DD system and at times it updates itself (marks order as delivered) without our knowledge. In these cases we always reach out and inform the customer and make the delivery as quickly as we can. We can’t find an order in our system for Christopher Thomas, could you provide the name your order was placed under so that we may investigate further?

name: Jessica Ezell
text: Love the banana nut they were fresh an still warm. An very yummy

name: Angel Buchanan
text: Cafe Du Cupcake is the BEST! Their cupcakes are always flavored perfectly and just melt in your mouth! I’ve actually asked her to make my wedding cake because they’re just THAT good, so we’ll be discussing plans of that soon! Stop by next time you’re in the mall. I make special trips out here just to get a dozen to bring home for my family! You won’t regret it.

name: Marsy
text: My husband and I tried this place out and we loved it! We tried the strawberry, cookies and cream, and lemon cupcakes. They are delicious you gotta try them if you’re at the mall. We hope they add cakes to their menu soon! The lady who serviced us was amazing too, so knowledgeable and friendly!

name: Steven
text:
Sub par customer service.    Canceled an order after it should have been delivered. Did not contact me with a reason just canceled.

Then contacted me blaming it on a hurricane yet they accepted the order so 🤷

resp.text: Sorry but ALL BUSINESSES HAVE BEEN CLOSED DUE TO TROPICAL STORM ZETA. We apologize for not providing you with impeccable service by assuming everyone on the GREATER MOBILE AREA WAS AWARE. Stay safe!

name: Deidra Smiler
text: CafeDuCupcake is the best! The owner is very sweet and kind and her hardwork shows through every bite of her delicious cupcakes! Definitely recommend coming here.

name: Cass Morrissette
text: Oh My God I just try the lemon cream dream and it to die for Please go and see This Sweet Young

name: Carmisha Sylvester
text: 🧁The best cupcakes 🧁 in the city . You go to the mall and leave with a 1/2 or a dozen 🧁😋🥰😊

name: Kamron Silver
text: I'm buying a dozen the next time I go back
